title: Lag
body: I'm from Romania (EUNE) but I'm playing in EUW. In some match i get 500 ping for 5-10 seconds.Rest of the match ping is 56.How can i fix that? My internet have 300download.

replies.body: Those sudden spikes could be caused by packet loss or how your ISP is trying to route you to the EUW server.  To start off, run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) on these games.  This will give us an overview of your specific case, so let me know what you find!
